attributes.action: consider, before making changes to the Members of Parliament salaries and expenses,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that changes should be made to improving the British system of voting in a Government. A democratic voting system of proportional representation should be introduced, this would make the Members of Parliament more representative of the British people, an improvement over the first past the post system, now in use.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
